question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Consumer Rights Day (WCRD)?
option3: Building a digital world consumers can trust
answer: Building a digital world consumers can trust
explanation: The World Consumer Rights Day (WCRD) is observed every year on March 15 to promote the basic rights of all consumers, demanding that those rights are respected and protected. It also gives people a chance to protest against the market abuses and social injustices. The 2017 theme is \'Building a Digital World Consumers can Trustâ€™. In India, besides the WCRD, we observe the National Consumer Day (NCD) on 24th of December every year.
